q: I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office. More distracted TTC driver photos surface

As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said,`` I care deeply about animals'' and`` am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to`` propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. Larry Page is to take over as chief executive in April from Eric Schmidt , who will then become executive chairman. The internet firm said Eric Schmidt would focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships , while Page would lead product development and technology strategy.
